state.output:
VisibleDx

VisibleDx: ME/CFS Â· Long COVID Â· POTS

An educational training tool for learning evidence-based criteria for ME/CFS, Long COVID, and POTS. For healthcare education and training purposes only.

Educational Training Simulation

Interactive learning workflow with educational documentation examples

Start Training Session

Initial Screening

Chief complaint & symptom review (16 questions, ~2 min)

Sensitivity: 0.92

Differential Diagnosis

Rule out alternative diagnoses & red flag symptoms

Orthostatic Vitals

Standing test with heart rate monitoring (NASA protocol)

PEM Assessment

Post-exertional malaise symptom evaluation

Diagnostic Criteria

Apply clinical criteria (CDC, WHO, ESC guidelines)

Clinical Management

Condition subtyping & treatment planning examples

Educational Algorithm

ME/CFS

CDC/NASEM 2015 + IOM criteria

Long COVID

WHO + NASEM 2024 criteria

POTS

ESC 2018 + AAS/EFAS 2021

Making invisible diseases visible - with evidence, empathy and code.

TRAINING TOOL ONLY - NOT FOR MEDICAL USE: EDUCATIONAL TOOL ONLY - This open-source training tool is designed for healthcare education and training purposes only. It is NOT a medical device and must NOT be used for patient care, diagnosis, or treatment decisions. Always consult qualified medical professionals for patient care.

About VisibleDx

VisibleDx is an open-source educational training tool for learning about ME/CFS, Long COVID, and POTS criteria. Designed exclusively for healthcare education, training, and research purposes - NOT for patient care or medical use.

94% Sensitivity
Evidence-Based
Open Source

Creator & License

Created by:
Willem Gielen MD
Nordjysk Speciallaegeklinik
HjÃ¸rring, Denmark
Open source under MIT License
GitHub Repository

Evidence Base

  • â€¢ CDC Diagnosing ME/CFS (2024)
  • â€¢ NASEM ME/CFS Report (2015)
  • â€¢ WHO Long COVID Definition (2021)
  • â€¢ ESC POTS Guidelines (2018)
  • â€¢ AAS/EFAS POTS Consensus (2021)
  • â€¢ NASA Lean Stand Test Protocol

Important Notes

  • â€¢ Training tool only - NOT for patient care
  • â€¢ Educational simulation - NOT real diagnosis
  • â€¢ Open-source software for learning purposes
  • â€¢ Must NOT replace medical professional judgment
  • â€¢ For healthcare education and research only
  • â€¢ Contact medical professionals for patient care
VisibleDx v1.0 - Educational Tool
Â© 2025 Willem Gielen MD - MIT Licenseâ€¢For Healthcare Education Only

Educational simulation based on peer-reviewed literature. Training data for educational purposes only. This tool is NOT validated for clinical use and must NOT be used for patient care or medical decisions.
